title: LA County Solar Installations
name: LA County Solar Installations
description:
Individual solar array installations around Los Angeles, California.

Data from the LA County Solar Map: http://lacounty.solarmap.org/

properties.description: A 2.8 kW solar array installed at  with a total of 4,172 kW per year generated, and an estimated savings of 876 $ per year.
properties.quote: One reason that I made the investement in solar power is that my price for electricity won't go up for the next 25 years

A 3.51 kW solar array installed at  with a total of 5,230 kW per year generated, and an estimated savings of 784 $ per year.
properties.quote: I believe in solar so much that I got a job at a local solar company.  Global warming national security and sky rocketing future energy costs convinced me solar was the way to go.  The utility rebate and federal tax credit made it a no brainer

properties.description: A 1.35 kW solar array installed at  with a total of 2,012 kW per year generated, and an estimated savings of 302 $ per year.
properties.quote: My concern about the climate change and the ability to save money at the same time meant that as soon as I could afford to put in solar I did
